title: LAST CALL for Spring Accelerator Applications – Get Yours in NOW!
content: Are you an awesome entrepreneur who’s ready to GO BIG? Today’s your last chance to apply for our Spring Accelerator program and take your startup to the next level. Get your application in TODAY. We’ve received tons of fantastic applications so far – in many of the areas we’re really excited about, like video tech, family tech, and language tech. We’ve been getting great submissions from international startups, too. For a chance to be part of our next batch of startups, apply RIGHT NOW; applications close at 11: 59pm, PST tonight. The 500 team will review applications and interview folks over the next few weeks. We’ll do our best to contact all applicants about their status. Stay tuned!
